thread.title: Shia LaBeouf sends cryptic tweet after arrest
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf sends cryptic tweet after arrest | Newsday

author: FRANK LOVECE. Special to Newsday
title: Shia LaBeouf sends cryptic tweet after arrest
text:
Days after being arrested for public intoxication in Austin, Texas, on Friday, "Transformers" star Shia LaBeouf posted puzzling comments on his verified Twitter page.
"I talk, just not to you," the actor, 29, wrote on Sunday.
The tweet, which was sent to his more than 320,000 followers, was retweeted more than 4,000 times.
He then tweeted on Monday, "bombs away."
LaBeouf was arrested after becoming confrontational with a police officer who had stopped him and two women for jaywalking and obstructing traffic, the Austin American-Statesman reported.
Celebrities Shia LaBeouf charged with public intoxication Additionally, according to the police affidavit, he began "puffing his chest and walking in an aggressive and threatening manner" at someone shooting video of the encounter.
LaBeouf was booked into Travis County Jail and later released.
